thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com | 6 of 10
thread.title: Jon Haraldsson

author: Jon Haraldsson
title: Jon Haraldsson
text: I would recommend this service to any player who wants to get a quick achivement, like i did and for a quick and easy gear loot. I personaly would recommend the self play option, which enables players to experience the dungeon itself. The group was very good, knew exacly what they were doing which was quite handy for me since i had never made it past the first boss.
